text: What the fashion industry says is sexy and what people actually find sexy can be very different. While some in the industry have been embracing bigger women in recent years, not many of them have been doing it very well. Robbie Tripp, an author from San Francisco, recently decided to write a tribute to his "curvy" wife, and how she helped him see past what is normally considered attractive.
title: Husband's Open Letter Thanking His 'Curvy' Wife Goes Viral For The Best Reason

meta_data.description: Robbie Tripp, an author from San Francisco, recently decided to write a tribute to his "curvy" wife.
